header.description: Plugin for applying puppet manifests or calling puppet agent.

step-type.name: Apply
step-type.description: Apply one or more manifest through puppet.

property-ui.label: Puppet Executable
property-ui.description: Full path to puppet executable or just 'puppet' if on path.

property-ui.label: Includes
property-ui.description: New line seperated list of include patterns for manifests to be applied. The manifests must exist in the UrbanCode Agent's working directory.

property-ui.label: Excludes
property-ui.description: New line seperated list of exclude patterns.

property-ui.label: Additional Arguments
property-ui.description: List of additional arguments to include. Include each argument on a separate line.

step-type.name: Update From Puppet Master
step-type.description: Run puppet agent to get updates from master.

property-ui.label: Puppet Executable
property-ui.description: Full path to puppet executable or just 'puppet' if on path.

property-ui.label: Run One Time
property-ui.description: Specify to run the configuration one time.

property-ui.label: Verbose
property-ui.description: Specify verbose output for the command.

property-ui.label: Daemonize
property-ui.description: Send the process into the background or not.

property-ui.label: Additional Arguments
property-ui.description: List of additional arguments to include. Include each argument on a separate line.
